description:
Run awesome meetings that boost team performance and turn yourself into confident facilitator along the way!

## Now more than 1200 happy students! 4.9 average review rating!

Turn Your Meetings Into Valuable Time Savers

  • Run appreciated meetings that give results without wasting people's time and energy
  • Fix your team: run retrospective meetings the way they were meant
  • Learn practical skills and tools to manage your group
  • Turn team problems into valuable improvements
  • Learn a 5-step method to create super effective retrospective meetings
  • Add facilitation skills to your CV
  • Deal with problematic people and handle yourself when things heat up

Help Your Team Become More Productive And Engaged With Collaborative Meetings

Running effective meetings is a crucial skill in any workplace today. It saves time, gives immediate results and is highly appreciated: People know you will make their time well spent. So this is something you need to know. This course shows you how.

Being able to transform your group into a highly productive team is a dream come true for any organisation and makes your work more fun and rewarding. It also gives you the upper hand in any meeting or when dealing with other people.

Bonus: Exclusive e-book available only for students!

Handpicked meeting activities with detailed instructions you can choose from based on what you want to achieve.

## Course Overview ##

Design: First, you'll learn how to design your meetings with ease using a powerful, proven five-step method. This method guides you, step by step with detailed instructions how to kick off the retrospective meeting all the way to wrapping it up.

Create: Next, you’ll focus on how to create your meetings and how you can create effective agendas with a clear purpose and goal.

Run: Finally, how to run your meetings without wasting people's time and energy. Learn practical tips to manage the group, make team decisions and use professional facilitation tools. Deal with people who dominate and how to get others to speak up. And, of course, how to keep yourself calm and focused during the meeting.

title: How To Run Effective Agile Scrum Meetings in 5 Easy Steps
